plot: Disgraced (and now released from prison) ex lawyer, uses his accumulated knowledge to earn a living from both sides of the law.
plot_en: Disgraced (and now released from prison) ex lawyer, uses his accumulated knowledge to earn a living from both sides of the law.
plot_es: Disgraced (and now released from prison) ex lawyer, uses his accumulated knowledge to earn a living from both sides of the law.
title: The Informer
